How to Troubleshoot Low Water Pressure In The Shower Do you know how to troubleshoot low water pressure in the shower? If you don’t know there is no problem. Because, I’ll provide you some important information. By this information you will be able to solve your problem. If you already know about it then I’ll also told you that, don’t move from here. Because I’ll provide you some secret information what you didn’t know yet. Just stay with us and read this content carefully. Why Does Your Shower Have Low Water Pressure? First of all we have to know the main reasons of low water pressure. Low Water Pressure can be caused by many things. There are multiple causes of low water pressure. But there are also many ways that you can troubleshoot your problem. Let’s know the reasons and solutions for this. Blocked Shower Heads Showerheads can also accumulate mineral deposits from hard water over time, decreasing the volume and flow of water through your showerhead. The problem could be blocked Shower Heads. Solutions: You can remove mineral deposits from your shower head by unscrewing the detachable showerhead component and soaking in a bowl of vinegar for at least eight hours. You can then scrub remaining deposits away with a toothbrush or a toothpick. This can help improve the flow of water through your showerhead. Too Much Demand On The Water Supply If you're in the shower while the dishwasher is running or the toilet is being flushed, your water supply is being directed to two different place. The pressure is basically being diluted. And some of the water that would have gone to the shower is being sent elsewhere. If your shower water pressure increase and return to normal when no other water is being used, this is probably the issue. Solutions: Don’t run for other water when you’re in the shower. Just keep clam and wait some minutes. Problem With The Main Pressure Low water pressure in your shower may be a result of low main water pressure. Whilst the water meter valve is generally the responsibility of city. If plumbing work has been done on your system. If possible this valve is not fully opened. On the homeowners side of the water meter. There’s also the main shut off valve and in line valves that may also be partially closed. 
Solutions: A qualified plumber can check and evaluate the water pressure through your main supply and help you discover what might be contributing to low water pressure. 
Some Tips
 
• Call Your neighbor to see if they are experiencing water pressure issue too. If they are, there may be a leak in the lines. Call the water department to report the issue. 
• Ask a plumber to check the water lines within your home or building. Older water lines sometimes become clogged or filled with mineral deposits. When this happens, replacement of your lines with copper or PVC piping to restore water pressure is necessary. 
• Pay attention to when your water pressure fluctuates. Water pressure can decrease during times more people on your line use water. Conclusion 
A good shower Can help you to get moving in the morning. And it also can refresh you after a good workout long day for work. This is very important. But low water pressure in shower is more common problem now. And this is so boring. 
By following this way you can troubleshoot low water pressure in the shower. I hope, through this content you could be find out your problem. And also we will be able to solve your problem now.

What is the tallest toilet you can buy?\n\n
There are many toilets in the market now a day. People often got confuse which one they should buy. A regular toilet or the tallest one which is better and which the difference between the two. Now the question is what is the tallest toilet you can buy? Or is the regular one is better for your everyday need. When you are shopping for a toilet one thing keep in mind that you invest for long time purpose. So the price tag is not important here. The important is which you need in a toilet such as comfort, height, flushing system or other thing. You of course have some list of your need. Here we show you the difference between the tallest toilet and regular toilet. The difference between the tallest toilet and regular toilet The main difference lies between the two is height. A regular toilet normally has a seat which is fifteen inches tall. Where as a tallest toilet has a seat of seventeen inches from the floor to the seat. It sometime crosses the seventeen inch plus depending on seat you choose. On the other hand, the regular toilet is not able to give you these extra two inches height. In general sense two inches seems to be very low difference but it brings large benefit. Especially for those who are tall in height and someone who is aged in race. More over most of the tallest toilet comes with ADA compliant. Usually speaking ADA stands for American disabilities act. More clearly it enacted to protect the right of the disabilities people. While the regular toilet is in absent of this feature. Particularly saying, in ADA compliant it is compulsory that a seat must be 17” to 19” high from the floor to seat. On the contrary regular toilet is limited within the height of 14” to 15”. What is the reason behind buying a tallest toilet? Tallest toilet can be good for knees and back and offer real advantage for all type of people. Although the tallest toilet only 2 or 3 inches high than regular toilet but it will help mostly the tall people to get up and down from the toilet. In addition the aged people get highly benefit from tallest toilet. At old age it is natural to having a knees and back problem. But tallest toilet helps them in many ways to avoid this pain while they use it. If anyone becomes handicapped or some other health problem like- broken ankle, broken leg or hand then tallest toilet help those most. As it is tall in height one can easily use it and this one also helps to access with a wheel chair. A tallest toilet also might be helpful for assisted a flushing system by making push down on the handle easier. This favors bring advantage for those who are handicapped or somehow unable to use their full hand in flushing time. The flushing system also helps normal people to make the flush easier. Though tallest toilet help tallest people or aged person in various way. It does not mean that it is not suitable for short people or young one. It is good one for all sorts of people with all ages. Advantage of tallest toilet It helps with hip, knees, back related punctuality Perfect for aged people Bring great benefit for handicapped people Make comfort for tallest person Conclusion Invest money for a toilet is a big deal. As it is investment for a long time and everyday need. Before buying a toilet you have to make sure for what benefit you are looking in toilet. As the above we are discussing and try to show you what is tallest toilet and for what reason you can buy this.

How to process Food by Water Bath Canning Not all the fruits are available throughout the year. Some are, but they vary tastes according to the season. For the blessings now we can grow fruits in summer which generally grows in winter. But they don’t taste well. Good news is, we can preserve food for a long time and have the same taste over the year. Water bath canning is now very easy and simplified when it comes to protecting food. Most people are using it to process fruits, vegetables, jams, jellies, chutney, and pickles at home. Step-by-step instructions are given below: Necessary equipment You can find home canning kits in hardware stores and online as well. But most of them you already have in the kitchen. Still, if you want, you can buy the followings:  Canning jar and lids  Large Pot  Rack that fits inside the pot  Flexible spatula or chopsticks  Canning funnel  Jar lifter  Clean towel Step 1 First of all\, you need to wash canning jars with hot soapy water and rinse them properly. Step 2 Now put all the jars and add water to cover them in a way that the lid stays one inch below the water level. Keep the pot until the temperature is 1800 F and simmer it for 10 minutes. Then bring down the jars and dry them. Step 3 Fill the jar with your processed food to within one or half inches to top of the rim. Step 4 Then use spatula of chopstick couple of time on the inside to get rid of the air bubbles. Make sure that there are no air bubbles then put more preserve and repeat the same. Step 5 Before placing the lid, you have to wipe the rim to ensure proper sealing. Then tighten the band until you feel it\'s properly tightened. Step 6 After that put the jars again in the hot boiling water. Check the water level carefully; it must cover every jar by 1-2 inches. If not add more water and keep them for at least 10 minutes for boiling. Step 7 Now it\’s time to take them out from the pot and keep them on a towel and leave to cool for 12-24 hours. Step 8 Time to check the seal, to do that press on a finger on the center of a jar, it doesn\’t popped-out you have a good seal. Otherwise, refrigerate those jars for three weeks. Conclusion To sum up, water bath canning is the easiest way to store preserve food at home. However, it\\’s essential to know that high-acidic foods including- jams, jellies, and other fruit, etc. can be preserved by this process. You need to make sure that the recipe is tested and safe to go along with this procedure.

DIY Portable Folding Workbench\n\n Workbenches are the kind of tables that are popularly used for manual work. Workbenches range broadly in their design. Transportable workbenches are the perfect solution to take care of having a space to work at. They are light sufficient, and so they can move from place to place. This is to deliver the needed workspace one needs. Everyone has run into the condition of working behind the home or somewhere that nothing is close by to offer provision. Or even hold an item when you require an extra hand. The Best Type of Portable Folding Workbench There are various types of folding workbenches. The most usual form is the folding bench that you can screw to the wall of your basement or garage. This workbench is fold-able straight whenever there is a need to free specific space in your workspace. With the new kind of folding bench, you can get more space when needed because it can be folded flat. Then you can move into a considerable cabinet or any partition that can hold it. This type is frequently smaller than the enclosed version. People suggest this type of bench for those who do not do substantial work. Workbench Designs Constituents Calculate your workspace first before beginning on your workbench schemes and plans. It is essential to measure your workspace to be capable of deciding how much wood you are going to need. Bring the dimensions with you when you are going to the hardware shop. Next step on finishing your workbench designs is to limit the kind of lumber that you must use. Typically, most workbench designs have written down the types of screws and wood to buy. Therefore, if you are looking forward to constructing a withstanding bench that you might use on a daily basis, you must use beech wood. Beechwood is the familiar type of wood used for a permanent day-to-day chair. For those who need a lighter and portable bench, you may create a workbench out of birch wood. Birchwood might not be as heavy as beech, but it is long-lasting and can build a solid workbench. You are also going to need:- • Round saw. • Drill or Screws. • A screwdriver. • Lumber. The amount would depend on what plan you tailed. • Corner rectangular. • Mallet. • Gauging tape. • Marker. • A belt sander. • Nuts, bolts, spikes and wood glue. • Clamps. • Eye safety. It is not essential to have high-powered tackles such as electric drills. Though, having these tools can speed up the method of constructing your workbench. Steps To Build the Workbench If you by now have your resources and equipment, it\'s time to begin workbench designs. First, you have to cut the wood. Cut the fragments of wood conferring to the right sizes. Drill the holes used for lag screws. Then, drill a quarter inch hole through a one and a quarter inch countersink. The top rails, as well as lower rails, need to be in the center of the wooden legs. Next, the following step on finishing workbench projects is to put together the pieces. Begin with the posts and then the vast rails. Glue the interval screws. Set apart the posts and rails up until the glue is all dried up. Combine the two sides using the smaller rails. Glue the lower and the higher middle stretchers together with surface screws. Glue the plywood on the exterior of your workbench with wood glue and screw with one and a quarter screws. And that\'s it! Refining the Workbench There are some areas on the workbench that, with a few minor reworks, will materially recover its functioning and probably extend its life. None of these recommendations are dangerous, or even necessary for the seasonal user. None of these suggestions are complicating to implement, but I find that they would probably be worth the attempt as time passes. The \"fold-flat\" characteristic When this workbench assembles according to the directions or folded, the handles lay pointing down the legs regarding the floor. By reversing the way, the pins framed precisely reversed from the installation directions. The grips now are on top of the folded bench. Point away from the stands, and the legs do indeed entirely fold flat! A simple fix.
The hand-crank lock leads screw alteration I observed that the board that\'s affixed to the hand-cranked lead screw makes the shallow work boards work as a built-in vise. This was loose and flopped around as the grips reeled. To fix this, I used a jerk to tighten the crankshaft accessory on the moveable workbench. So that there was less play as soon as the unit turn. Don\'t over stiffen, or the board won\'t transfer at all! Making things run easily Be sure to grease all moving exteriors with oil or a dry film Grease. Be sure to lubricate all sliding or spinning joints and connectors. Especially those added washers on the stands where they fix to the side plates. Substitute the fiberboard work exteriors While this is a bench intended for light to moderate loads, you might contemplate replacing the work surface’s fiberboards with spans of 1½ X4 inch lumber. Also, consider suitably drilled holes for the plastic trailing clamp inserts. That will provide you a broader working surface when the two panels reeled to the max. Things You Should Consider When Buying As soon as you decide to buy a DIY portable workbench, the first thing that you must consider is the type of task that you are going to do with it. You might want to do woodworking or other functions that will require you to put huge and heavy objects on your workbench. Then you have to get a portable bench that used the solid material. A bench made of hardwood is the popular selection for people who are into a heavy-duty function. As soon as you shop for a portable wood bench, make sure that it is easy to carry and assemble. You may also take into account getting a portable workbench made of steel if you would be doing demanding work. Benches with steel tops would take all the throbbing that a conventional portable wood workbench can take. If you are not going to use massive apparatus with your work, then you can choose to get a portable bench that uses other materials. For example, a portable seat with plywood or melamine top and steel or aluminum legs can be far informal to transport. These are more comfortable than those which are entirely made of wood or steel. When you are spending on a portable bench, make sure that the wheels are of decent quality. Ask the online shop or hardware shop about the element used in it. Typically, wheels made of polypropylene would be sturdy enough. Making sure that the portable workbench has the correct bench top and legs and wheels is not sufficient. You also have to look for a portable bench with shelves or cabinets where you can effortlessly stack your work resources and tools. Conclusion A DIY portable folding workbench makes an outstanding gift for the holiday or special day for anyone who does any work with tackles. No matter if it is home restoration or auto repair. One would discover that a portable workbench helps get any chore done, in every place possible.

It is one of the greatest mysteries of the world and miseries of my life why \’dogs\’ are used in a negative sense. A person does something bad and there it is- A dog used as a Bengali slang to represent inhumanity. And! The word \’bitch\’ means a female dog and what is it not used for? I believe a person who is extremely selfish and careless should be called a cat. You get the point, I love dogs. What have they ever done to not be liked? Let me tell you a story first. A friend of my aunt went to India to stay for a few months. She was staying in a \’not so safe for ladies\’ zone and she used to go on morning walks every day. She used to feed a dog there and it used to join her on the walks. So one fine dawn, two strange men started following her. Eventually they started harassing her. She looked for her dog but it was nowhere to be found! She felt hopeless and a bit angry for having believed that dogs were loyal. But then she saw the dog. Not only the dog but the dogs. That brave little dog left only to bring his friends to protect his owner as he could not have done it alone. Now tell me, how often do you see a cat risking his life for his master? Rarely. Now let me mention some traits that make dogs much better pets than cats: 1. They are loyal and will wait for you forever.
Rarely do we find tales of a dog leaving his owner but how often do we hear it about cats? Quite often I tell you. All you have to do to make dogs remember you is feed them once! Here\’s another tale- A man got sick so he went to treat himself overseas leaving his dog behind. Unfortunately, the man died overseas. Guess what the dog did? It waited for his master on the coast of the sea, he left from at a specific time every day for his return till it died itself.
2. They feel guilty!
It is quite natural to find dogs and cats ruining your tissues, papers and wires or pooping on the carpet. But, have you ever seen cats give a damn about it? They will look at your face and act so proud as if you deserved what they did. On the other hand! Dogs seeing your reaction knows they are at fault and gets so sad feeling guilty that it will definitely melt your heart. It is better to deal with a guilty criminal than an arrogant one!
3. They try to comfort you. Every time you feel sad a dog will feel sympathy for you and cuddle you. 4. Dogs can be trained
There are countless instances where we see a dog being used by its owner to turn lights off or do other easy basic activities. They can do almost anything if they are trained. 5. Human friend since history
We have seen dogs being used in wars, hunts and what not? They have been man\’s companion since a very long time.
6. They get happy easily
Been away from home all day? Get home and you will find your dog being the happiest being on earth and jumping on you with its wagging tail. On the other hand, your cat will give an ignorant twitch of its tail and walk away.
7. Even the Smallest dog will protect you While cats are usually seen to run as far away from anger as they possibly can, dogs will be ready to be the only thing standing between you and danger to protect you! Even if it kills them.
8. Your dog will never hurt you even if you hurt them Try bathing a cat and coming out without any scratch. Nope, you will definitely need bandages. But, a dog will not scratch you even if you drown it.
9. They are funny! They are more confused than cats and they react more. Put a puppy in front of a mirror, you will know.
10. They Get Jealous. How cute is that? Do you even need a lover when you have a dog as your pet? They treasure you and unlike cats and everyone else they do not take you for granted!
Sorry cat lovers, cats are nice too but dogs are just better.

ETHLend : An Exciting New Thing In Blockchain Technology
Last year, no asset class could compare the crypto-currency. In less than 12 months, their total capital has increased from 18 to 835 billion. Although these assumptions include new coins, one thing is obvious: the price has increased rapidly. Up to now, there are more than 1500 digital coins and their perspectives towards block dynamic technology are becoming more complicated. ETHLend is one of them. It is the most useful crypto for borrowing another currency. It records all transactions in addition to a financial intermediary (usually the bank). Below I have given the most important information about ETHLend crypto :
 What Is ETHLend? ETHLend is a decentralized lending platform on the Ethereum blockchain. It enables loans for Ether by using ERC-20 compatible tokens or Ethereum Name Service (ENS) domains as collateral. ETHLend solves problems associated with lending on several fronts - • Reduces the potential loss of loan capital on default. • Smart contracts ensure that the lender\’s assets are secured through the borrower\’s collateral. • Introduces a reputation and credit system apart from the traditional credit system. • Potentially allows for tokenization of any as blockchain networks

How to Make Grilled Cheese Sandwich in a Toaster\n\n Do you grilled cheese ? .Who doesn\’t ?. This classic life hack will have you enjoying a grilled cheese in less than 3 minutes using only your toaster .Nothing is greater than a grilled cheese , except for a nice grilled cheese with tomato soup to dip it in . A toaster oven grilled cheese sandwich is the perfect easy office lunch , late night snack , or treat for whenever you have got a gooey melty cheese. Is there anything better than a grilled cheese sandwich ?. The only problem ? .Grilled cheese takes some time to make . Sure , it\’s not the hardest dish in the world . But it does require some preparetion and a little bit of patience . Thankfully , a product exists that makes it way easier to get your grilled cheese on . It\’s a grilled cheese toaster that makes to sandwiches at once .  Feelings : The combination of buttery toasted bread and melty cheese is so yummy . Each bite feels like a warm hug . And some days , friend , you just NEED a good chessey hug ! .Grilled sandwich is a very tasty and quick to make snack recipe for breakfast . But why use a toaster to make your sandwich you ask ? Whenever i make a grilled cheese on the stove . I always burn my bread before the cheese can melt . It\’s my own fault . If you can\’t face this kind of problem , then you\’re going to LOVE making grilled cheese sandwiches in your toaster . The heat in your little oven stays consistent so your sandwich comes out perfectly \” grilled \” every time . Let\’s go we know how to start :  Preparetion : I start by adjusting the toaster oven\’s cooking rack to the bottom position in the area closest to the heat . Next , place your baking pan on the rack and preheat the toaster on the \” Bake \” setting option .  Ingredients :
 4-6 cheese slices  2 slice of bread  Butter Let\’s start to make grilled cheese sandwich : Adjust toaster oven cooking rack to the lowest postition .Place your baking sheet inside the toaster oven and preheat it to 450 deggree on the \”Bake \” setting .  Add Cheese to one slice of Bread : Spread the outside of each slice of bread with butter . Place one piece of bread buttered side-down on a cutting board and top with cheese slices . Top with remaining bread slice , buttered side –up .
 Put the Slices in the Toaster : Using oven mitts , carefully remove the preheated pan from the toaster . Place the sandwich on the pan carefully. Then return to the toaster .  Place Your Plate and Wait for it : Cook sandwich untill the bottom is toasted and browned about 4 minutes . Carefully remove the pan again . Flip the sandwich with a spatula and retur to the toaster for another 3 to 4 minutes .  Turn it from Toaster : Cool slightly , then slice in half .When you found that this sandwich breads are properly cool . After that , you assemble the cheese . The toaster includes two baskets on the inside that will keep your sandwich in place while simultaneously catching any cheese runoff . Minutes later , your sandwich will be ready and will taste as if you grilled it up yourself . Plus , no pan to clean ! Bonus .  Serving : Grilled cheese sandwich also makes a very handy option to pack for kids lunch box . You can serve this grilled cheese sandwiches with potato chips , french fries , tomato ketchup or any sauce of your choice .
 Final Thoughts : If you struggle with burning grilled cheese on your stovetop . You are going to love this foolproof method for making grilled cheese in a toaster .Grilled sandwich is a very tasty lipsmacking snack prepared with bread filled with a tasty mix of vegetable ,cheese and mozzarella .These grilled sandwich are very easy to make .

Open Introduces Digital Payment Platform Digital payment platforms are rapidly growing in popularity across the world. But does this medium cash is deceased? That depends on how rapidly monetary organization s and payment providers can raise adoption rates. Digital payment platforms give relief from cashless transactions. People do not carry much cash money in their wallet. These platforms are efficient of making payments in offline mood as well as online. There are several platforms for digital transactions. These platforms feature are different. While making payments, you should make the best use of them. There are some digital payment platforms and their features: • Sound Based payments platform: Some association has introduced an app with sound transmission cash transfer facility. It is a technology that is only a software-driven app. When it uses, it does not need any hardware requirements on the ATMs. It is the highly secured application. It helps you to make the contactless transaction with this sound-based technology. You can download these applications in your mobile. After downloading these applications in your smartphone, you have to register through your cards. This app makes payments from your smartphone at any POS machine. Even you do not have cards along with you. • Mobile Money Identifier: If somebody wants to send money and receive that money should have MMID for the money transfer. MMID is a 7 digits unique code which issued by the bank on which you have registered mobile number. By MMID you cannot transfer huge amount with a single day. You can transfer only a small amount in a day. • Open Platform: It is a software system providing payment infrastructure. It is blockchain based on developer platform. It is simple for developers to use simply \”plug and play\”. The process of payments on blockchains that app would require.
• It accepts cryptocurrencies in the same way as the app would update their backend in a centralized decree transaction. • The application\’s payment scheme is monthly subscription when accepting cryptocurrency. • The people who purchased on a blockchain, it verifies, track, and authorize users. • It confirms that a purchaser of a digital service from an app. • By a developer API, the application updated layer, and database.
• Code (QR) based payments system: A code is a different system of making the transfer of payment. It only needs to scan the QR code for the transfer of payments. For it easily payments transfer, it is used by all the banking apps, digital payments apps. You can scan the code automatically through the smartphone.
• Online Bank payments Platforms: It means to take service of a bank by online. This facility can be available through the mobile banking system. If you have an online bank account, you need not go to the bank for your transaction. You can transfer the fund to your phone from anywhere.
Final Thoughts: Digital payment platform made easy transactions of money. The open platform which provides digital payment transaction. It is easy to use, process payments on the blockchain, which required an application. It is the first and only payment platforms that qualify developers to accept any cryptocurrency.
